documentation.text:
@dev IVote is an interface for contracts that implements a voting system. IVote contract should allow voters to chose M Winning Propositions among N Candidates Propositions (M<N). 
 Propositions are represented by numbers going from 1 to N. 0 proposition is the default proposition and represent the blank vote. 
 Voting choices can be clear or hashed with a bytes32 salt in order to prevent voters that hasn't voted yet from being influenced by oders voter's voting choices. 
 If votes are hashed, voters should validate their vote after the voting period is over, by submiting their clear voting choice with the corresponding salt.
 Serverals voting sessions with different parameters can be hold at the same time for various use case. 
 Each new ballot should be provided with the address of a "Voter register" contract that contain a whitelist of account allowed to vote and with the function selector of a "Voter register" contract function that allow to check whether an account is allowed to vote or not.

@dev End the voting stage if it is over. If votes are hashed then we start the validation stage, else votes are tailled and we should have access to winning propositions
 @param key Id of the voting session

@dev End the validation stage if it is over. Votes are tailled and we should have access to winning propositions
 @param key Id of the voting session

 Propositions are represented by numbers going from 1 to N. 0 proposition is the default proposition and represent the blank vote. 
 Voting choices can be clear or hashed with a bytes32 salt in order to prevent voters that hasn't voted yet from being influenced by oders voter's voting choices. 
 If votes are hashed, voters should validate their vote after the voting period is over, by submiting their clear voting choice with the corresponding salt.
 Serverals voting sessions with different parameters can be hold at the same time for various use case. 
 Each new ballot should be provided with the address of a "Voter register" contract that contain a whitelist of account allowed to vote and with the function selector of a "Voter register" contract function that allow to check whether an account is allowed to vote or not.

@dev End the voting stage if it is over. If votes are hashed then we start the validation stage, else votes are tailled and we should have access to winning propositions
 @param key Id of the voting session

@dev End the validation stage if it is over. Votes are tailled and we should have access to winning propositions
 @param key Id of the voting session

devdoc.details: IVote is an interface for contracts that implements a voting system. IVote contract should allow voters to chose M Winning Propositions among N Candidates Propositions (M<N).  Propositions are represented by numbers going from 1 to N. 0 proposition is the default proposition and represent the blank vote.  Voting choices can be clear or hashed with a bytes32 salt in order to prevent voters that hasn't voted yet from being influenced by oders voter's voting choices.  If votes are hashed, voters should validate their vote after the voting period is over, by submiting their clear voting choice with the corresponding salt. Serverals voting sessions with different parameters can be hold at the same time for various use case.  Each new ballot should be provided with the address of a "Voter register" contract that contain a whitelist of account allowed to vote and with the function selector of a "Voter register" contract function that allow to check whether an account is allowed to vote or not.

params.Check_Voter_Selector: Function Selector of a Voters_Register_Address contract's function in charge of checking whether an address belongs to accounts allowed to vote. The function should take an address in parameters and return a boolean.
params.Vote_Duration: Duration of the stage in which members are allowed to vote
params.Vote_Validation_Duration: Duration of the stage in which accounts who have voted have to validate their voting choice.
params.Voters_Register_Address: address of the contract that store account that are allowed to vote in this voting session
params.key: Id of the new voting session

End_Validation_Vote(bytes32).details: End the validation stage if it is over. Votes are tailled and we should have access to winning propositions

End_Vote(bytes32).details: End the voting stage if it is over. If votes are hashed then we start the validation stage, else votes are tailled and we should have access to winning propositions

Get_Voter_Number(bytes32).details: Get the number of accounts that have voted in the Voting session

Get_Winning_Proposition_byId(bytes32,uin.details: Get a winning proposition by it's rank. Only callable if the ballot have been tailled (after End_Vote of End_Validation_Vote call).

params.Id: Rank (index) of the proposition we want to get in the List of winning propositions.

Get_Winning_Propositions(bytes32).details: Get winning propositions list of a voting session. Only callable if the ballot have been tailled (after End_Vote of End_Validation_Vote call).

HasValidated(bytes32,address).details: Check whether an account has Validated his vote or not.

HasVoted(bytes32,address).details: Check whether an account has voted or not.

Valdiate_Vote(bytes32,uint256[],bytes32).details: Allows voter to validate their hashed voting choice by submitting it coupled with the salt bytes32 value that has been used to hash it. nly callable during Validation stage of a voting session.

params.Choices: Array of propositions Ids that correspond to voter choice
params.salt: bytes32 value that has been used to hash the "Choice" value.

Vote_Clear(bytes32,uint256[]).details: Allows a voter to vote clear in a voting session. Only callable during Voting stage of a voting session.

params.Choices: Array of propositions Ids that correspond to voter choice

Vote_Hashed(bytes32,bytes32).details: Allows a voter to vote in a voting session with an hashed voting choice in order to keep it secret until the vote validation stage. Only callable during Voting stage of a voting session.

params.Choice: Hash of the Array of propositions Ids that correspond to voter's choice with a salt bytes32 value created by the voter.
